Scripts.Text:
INIT:
    ::spawnUI

    set script_start AFTER_INIT

AFTER_INIT:
    talk intro
       talk_mode true
 
       ::setTextSpeed 1
       ::setSpeakerInternal SPEAKER_NONE
       face self towards player
       await talking_end

       ::setTextSpeed 3
       ::setSpeakerInternal SPEAKER_LINK
       force_talk talking
       face self towards player

       await textbox_num 2
       ::setSpeakerInternal SPEAKER_MALON

       await textbox_num 3
       ::setSpeakerInternal SPEAKER_ZELDA

       await textbox_num 4
       ::setSpeakerInternal SPEAKER_INGO

       await textbox_num 5
       ::setSpeakerInternal SPEAKER_DRAGMIRE

       await textbox_num 6
       ::setSpeakerInternal SPEAKER_JUDGE

       await textbox_num 7
       ::setSpeakerInternal SPEAKER_IMPA

       await textbox_num 8
       ::setSpeakerInternal SPEAKER_SOLDIER

       await textbox_num 9
       ::setSpeakerInternal SPEAKER_NONE

       await talking_end
     
       animation idle
       talk_mode false

    endtalk
Scripts.Name: Test

Scripts.Text:
if is_talking and textbox_drawing and var.2 == 0
    set animation talking once
    await animation_end
endif
Scripts.Name: TextTalkAnim

Messages.Name: talking
Messages.MessageText:
I am the great hero of law!
<New box>
No you aren't, you big doofus.
<New box>
Experts still divided on that one.
<New box>
Can it, you annoying brats!
<New box>
This is most pathetic.
<New box>
Order, order! I want a large pizza 
with pepperoni.
<New box>
Humpf. I don't think I can afford that
on my salary. Noodles, maybe?
<New box>
You are all under arrest!
<New box>
<SOUND:NA_SE_IT_LASH>WHAAAAT?

Messages.Name: intro
Messages.MessageText:
<NS><SPEED:3><DC><G><PIXELS_RIGHT:50><SOUND:NA_SE_IT_HOOKSHOT_STICK_OBJ>March 1, XXXX
<PIXELS_RIGHT:53>Testing Level
<PIXELS_RIGHT:25>Goodness Knows Where<SOUND:0>

Scripts.Text:
play cutscene
set script_start AFTER_INIT
set vSCENE_CUTSCENE_BARS = 1

AFTER_INIT:
    if cutscene_frame == 45
        show_textbox_sp Mes1
    elif cutscene_frame == 130
        show_textbox_sp Mes2
    elif cutscene_frame == 275
        show_textbox_sp Mes3
    elif cutscene_frame == 510
        show_textbox_sp Mes4
    elif cutscene_frame == 651
        play sfx NA_SE_EV_WALL_BROKEN
    elif cutscene_frame == 720
        set SAVE_PROGRESS = 1
        save 
        warp 0x9
    endif
Scripts.Name: CutsceneScript

Messages.Name: Mes1
Messages.MessageText: <NS>It's so quiet...<FADE:50>

Messages.Name: Mes2
Messages.MessageText: <NS>Do you think they forgot?<FADE:60>

Messages.Name: Mes3
Messages.MessageText:
<NS>Forget a royal visitation? No one 
could make such a blunder, princess.<FADE:80>

Messages.Name: Mes4
Messages.MessageText:
<NS>Well, I guess I should just go 
in, then...<FADE:60>

Scripts.Text:
if cutscene_frame == 580
    set OPEN_DOORS true
    position direction_move_by self 0 0 40 1

    play bgm NA_BGM_FIELD_ENEMY_4
    play sfx NA_SE_VO_Z1_SURPRISE
    show_textbox_sp Mes5
    set SEGMENT_ENTRY SEGMENT_8 EyeScared
    set SEGMENT_ENTRY SEGMENT_9 EyeScared
    set animation HorrorStart once
    set animation Horror  

endif
Scripts.Name: Walk forward

Scripts.Text:
if cutscene_frame == 222
    play sfx NA_SE_EV_COW_CRY_LV
elif cutscene_frame == 555
    play sfx NA_SE_EV_CHICKEN_CRY_N
endif
Scripts.Name: Snd

Scripts.Text:
if vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION == NONE
    return
elif vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = MALON_SAD
    goto SET_SAD
elif vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = MALON_PENSIVE
    goto SET_PENSIVE
elif vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = MALON_NORMAL
    goto SET_NORMAL
elif vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = MALON_ANGRY
    goto SET_ANGRY
elif vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = MALON_CLAPPING
    goto SET_CLAPPING
elif vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = MALON_PHOTO_VISIBLE
    goto SET_PHOTO_VISIBLE
elif vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = MALON_PHOTO_INVISIBLE
    goto SET_PHOTO_INVISIBLE
elif vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = MALON_MOVE_HEAD_UP
    goto SET_MOVE_HEAD_UP
elif vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = MALON_GIVE_PHOTO
    goto SET_GIVE_PHOTO
elif vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = MALON_NORMALSAD
    goto SET_NORMALSAD
endif

return

SET_MOVE_HEAD_UP:
    var.3 = 0
    while var.3 != 10
        set DLIST_ROT_Z Head -= 400
        var.3 += 1  
        await frames 0
    endwhile
    set vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = NONE
    return

SET_GIVE_PHOTO:
    var.3 = 0
    while var.3 != 10
        set DLIST_ROT_Z Hand -= 1400
        var.3 += 1
        await frames 0
    endwhile

    var.3 = 0
    set DLIST_VISIBILITY Pictograph NOT_VISIBLE

    while var.3 != 10
        set DLIST_ROT_Z Hand += 1400
        var.3 += 1
        await frames 0
    endwhile

    set vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = NONE
    return

SET_PHOTO_VISIBLE:
    set DLIST_VISIBILITY Pictograph WITH_LIMB
    set vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = NONE
    return

SET_PHOTO_INVISIBLE:
    set DLIST_VISIBILITY Pictograph NOT_VISIBLE
    set vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = NONE
    return


SET_SAD:
    set DO_BLINKING_ANIMATIONS false
    set SEGMENT_ENTRY SEGMENT_8 Cry
    set TALK_PATTERN MouthSad,MouthOpen,MouthOpenMore
    set ref_actor self
    set actor.rotY = 6720
    set animation Sad
    set vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = NONE
    return

SET_PENSIVE:
    set DO_BLINKING_ANIMATIONS false
    set SEGMENT_ENTRY SEGMENT_8 Cry
    set TALK_PATTERN MouthSad,MouthOpen,MouthOpenMore
    set ref_actor self
    set actor.rotY = 6720
    set animation Pensive
    set vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = NONE
    return

SET_NORMAL:
    set DO_BLINKING_ANIMATIONS true
    set TALK_PATTERN MouthIdle,MouthOpen,MouthOpenMore
    set BLINK_PATTERN EyeOpen EyeMid EyeClosed
    set ref_actor self
    set actor.rotY = 6720
    set animation Idle
    set DLIST_ROT_Z Head = 0
    set vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = NONE
    return

SET_NORMALSAD:
    set DO_BLINKING_ANIMATIONS false
    set SEGMENT_ENTRY SEGMENT_8 Cry
    set TALK_PATTERN MouthSad,MouthOpen,MouthOpenMore
    set ref_actor self
    set actor.rotY = 6720
    set animation Idle
    set DLIST_ROT_Z Head = 0
    set vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = NONE
    return

SET_ANGRY:
    set DO_BLINKING_ANIMATIONS true
    set TALK_PATTERN MouthSad,MouthOpen,MouthOpenMore
    set BLINK_PATTERN Angry AngryClosed
    set ref_actor self
    set actor.rotY = 6720    
    set animation WideArms
    set vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = NONE
    return

SET_CLAPPING:
    set DO_BLINKING_ANIMATIONS true
    set TALK_PATTERN MouthIdle,MouthOpen,MouthOpenMore
    set BLINK_PATTERN EyeOpen EyeMid EyeClosed
    set ref_actor self
    set actor.rotY = 6720
    set animation Clapping
    set vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = NONE
    return
Scripts.Name: AnimationSet

Scripts.Text:
if vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION == NONE
    return
elif vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = SOLDIER_SPEAR_SLAM
    goto SET_SPEAR_SLAM
endif

return

SET_SPEAR_SLAM:
    set animation SpearSlam once
    await animation_frame = 10 
    play sfx NA_SE_IT_STONE_HIT
    await animation_end
    set animation Idle
    set vACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = NONE
    return
Scripts.Name: AnimSet

Scripts.Text:
#define CAMERA_MAIN 1
#define CAMERA_SOLDIER 421
#define CAMERA_BG 623

#define CURRENT_TEXT_POS var.1
#define CURRENT_TEXT_ID var.2
#define CURRENT_SPEAKER var.3
#define CAN_OPEN_COURTRECORD var.4

INIT:
    EVIDENCE = EVIDENCE_START
    CAN_OPEN_COURTRECORD = 0
    ::spawnUI
    play cutscene
    set pause_cutscene true
    set save16.0x13EA = 0
    set script_start AFTER_INIT

AFTER_INIT:
    await frames 10
    ::setTextSpeed 1
    ::textboxSpeaker EntryText SPEAKER_NONE
    ::setTextSpeed 3

AFTER_INTRO_TEXT:
    play bgm NA_BGM_DUNGEON
    CAN_OPEN_COURTRECORD = 1
    ::textboxLink Link_1
    await frames 20
    ::textboxLink Link_1b
    ::setCamera CAMERA_SOLDIER
    ::rotate LOBBY_SOLDIER1 0 DEG_20 0 DEG_5
    ::setActorAnim LOBBY_SOLDIER1 SOLDIER_SPEAR_SLAM
    ::textboxSoldier Soldier_1
    ::textboxLink Link_2
    ::textboxSoldier Soldier_2
    ::rotate LOBBY_SOLDIER1 0 DEG_-20 0 DEG_5
    play SFX_GLOBAL NA_SE_EV_DOOR_CLOSE
    ::textboxSoldier Soldier_3

MALON_APPEARS:
    ::setActorAnim LOBBY_MALON MALON_SAD
    await frames 5
    ::setNpcMakerVisible LOBBY_MALON
    ::setCamera CAMERA_MAIN

    await frames 10
    ::textboxMalon Malon_1
    ::textboxLink Link_3
    ::textboxMalon Malon_2
    CAN_OPEN_COURTRECORD = 0
    set vSCENE_CUTSCENE_BARS = 1
    ::textboxLink Link_4
    set vSCENE_CUTSCENE_BARS = 0
    CAN_OPEN_COURTRECORD = 1

    ::setActorAnim LOBBY_MALON MALON_PENSIVE
    ::textboxMalon Malon_3
    ::textboxLink Link_5
    ::setActorAnim LOBBY_MALON MALON_CLAPPING
    ::textboxMalon Malon_4
    ::textboxLink Link_6

    await frames 3
    ::setSpeakerInternal SPEAKER_LINK
    show_textbox_sp Link_7
    await textbox_drawing false
    ::setActorAnim LOBBY_MALON MALON_SAD
    await textbox_on_screen false

CHOICE:

    set RESPONSE_ACTIONS LINK_BELIEVES LINK_DISBELIEVES
    ::textboxMalon Malon_5
    await response

LINK_BELIEVES:
    ::textboxLink Link_8_Choice1
    goto AFTER_CHOICE

LINK_DISBELIEVES:
    ::textboxLink Link_8_Choice2
    ::setActorAnim LOBBY_MALON MALON_ANGRY
    ::textboxMalon Malon_7_Choice2
    ::textboxLink Link_9_Choice2

AFTER_CHOICE:
    ::setActorAnim LOBBY_MALON MALON_NORMALSAD
    await frames 15
    ::setActorAnim LOBBY_MALON MALON_PHOTO_VISIBLE
    await frames 2
    ::setActorAnim LOBBY_MALON MALON_SAD
    await frames 20

    ::setTextSpeed 1
    ::textboxMalon Malon_8
    ::setTextSpeed 3

    ::textboxLink Link_10
    ::setActorAnim LOBBY_MALON MALON_NORMAL
    ::textboxMalon Malon_9

PICTURE:
    CAN_OPEN_COURTRECORD = 0
    FADEOUT 0 0 0 15
    ::setCamera CAMERA_BG
    spawn 6
    endspawn
    FADEIN 35
    ::textboxMalon Malon_10
    ::setActorAnim LOBBY_MALON MALON_SAD
    FADEOUT 0 0 0 25
    kill actor_id 6
    ::setCamera CAMERA_MAIN
    FADEIN 25
    CAN_OPEN_COURTRECORD = 1

AFTER_PICTURE:
    ::textboxLink Link_11
    ::setActorAnim LOBBY_MALON MALON_PENSIVE
    ::textboxMalon Malon_11
    ::textboxLink Link_12
    ::setActorAnim LOBBY_MALON MALON_MOVE_HEAD_UP
    await frames 15
    ::textboxMalon Malon_12
    ::setActorAnim LOBBY_MALON MALON_NORMAL
    ::textboxMalon Malon_12b



    ::setActorAnim LOBBY_MALON MALON_GIVE_PHOTO

    EVIDENCE = EVIDENCE_GOTPHOTO
    ::textboxSpeaker Court_Record_1 SPEAKER_NONE

    ::textboxLink Link_13
    ::setActorAnim LOBBY_MALON MALON_PENSIVE
    ::textboxMalon Malon_13

ENTER_COURT:
    CAN_OPEN_COURTRECORD = 0
    play bgm 0
    ::setTextSpeed 5
    ::setCamera CAMERA_SOLDIER
    ::rotate LOBBY_SOLDIER1 0 DEG_20 0 DEG_20
    ::setActorAnim LOBBY_SOLDIER1 SOLDIER_SPEAR_SLAM
    ::textboxSoldier Soldier_4
    ::setTextSpeed 3

    ::setCamera CAMERA_MAIN
    ::setActorAnim LOBBY_MALON MALON_SAD
    ::textboxLink Link_14

    
    FADEOUT 0 0 0 5

    ::textboxLink Link_15

    script stop 0
Scripts.Name: LobbyCutscene

Scripts.Text:
#define CURRENT_TEXT_POS var.1
#define CURRENT_TEXT_ID var.2
#define CURRENT_SPEAKER var.3
#define CAN_OPEN_COURTRECORD var.4
#define CURRENT_TEXT_POSDRAW var.5

Start:

set ref_actor self
npcmaker.isSpeaking = 1

::setCutsceneBars


if TEXTBOX_DRAWING false and TEXTBOX_ON_SCREEN true and CAN_OPEN_COURTRECORD == 1 and gTextboxDrawPos > 0

    if BUTTON_PRESSED BTN_R
        script stop 0
        CURRENT_TEXT_POS = npcmaker.curTextPos
        CURRENT_TEXT_ID = npcmaker.curtextId
        CURRENT_TEXT_ID += 0x8000
        CURRENT_TEXT_POSDRAW = gTextboxDrawPos
        npcmaker.curtextId = -1

        set REF_ACTOR ACTOR_ID 1
        ccall NpcM_GetCurSpeaker CURRENT_SPEAKER

        CLOSE_TEXTBOX
        ::setSpeakerInternal SPEAKER_NONE
        PLAY SFX NA_SE_SY_WIN_OPEN

        SPAWN 3
            POSITION RELATIVE 0 0 0 
            VARIABLE 58
            ROTATION 0 0 50
        ENDSPAWN

        set SCRIPT_START Await_CourtRecord_End

        Await_CourtRecord_End:
            SET REF_ACTOR NPCMAKER 50
            if REF_ACTOR_EXISTS true
                return
            else    
                goto CourtRecord_Closed
            endif

        CourtRecord_Closed:
            close_textbox   
            //await textbox_on_screen false
            show_textbox_sp CURRENT_TEXT_ID
            gTextBufPos = CURRENT_TEXT_POS
            await TEXTBOX_DRAWING true

            // Restore text position, but it has to wait for the message to start
            // being typed out
            gTextboxDrawPos = 0             
            await gTextboxDrawPos > 0
            gTextboxDrawPos = CURRENT_TEXT_POSDRAW

            ::setSpeakerInternal CURRENT_SPEAKER

            set SCRIPT_START Start
            script start 0
    endif
endif
Scripts.Name: Always

Messages.Name: EntryText
Messages.MessageText:
<NS><SPEED:1><DC><G><PIXELS_RIGHT:43><SOUND:NA_SE_IT_HOOKSHOT_STICK_OBJ>March 17, 9:47 AM
<PIXELS_RIGHT:45>Hyrule Grand Court
<PIXELS_RIGHT:37>Defendant Lobby No. 3<SOUND:0>

Messages.Name: Link_1
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:0><NS><C>(Another day, another court case...
This should be easy, after all 
I've been through.)
<New_box>
<NS><DI><C><SOUND:NA_SE_IT_BOMB_EXPLOSION>(..<Sound:0>.so why am I shaking?!)
<New_box>
<NS><C>(Gah.<PAUSE> I guess it's a lot more stressful 
when your friend's life is on the line.)

Messages.Name: Link_2
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:TXT_MALE><NS>Well, yes, I believe it is! My client's not 
here yet, and the trial's about to start!

Messages.Name: Link_3
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:TXT_MALE><NS>Ah!<PAUSE> Hello!<PAUSE> No, no. Don't worry!<PAUSE>
Everything's fine.

Messages.Name: Link_4
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:0><NS><C>(This is <R>Malon<C>. 
Ever since we met in the Castle Town 
all those years ago, we've been 
great friends.)
<New_box>
<NS><C>(She can be a bit aloof, but her 
heart's in the right place, I know she 
cared deeply about her father.)

Messages.Name: Soldier_1
Messages.MessageText: <SOUND:TXT_MALE><NS>H-huh?<PAUSE> Yes? Is something the matter?

Messages.Name: Soldier_2
Messages.MessageText: <SOUND:TXT_MALE><NS>W-well, I, uh...<Fade:20>

Messages.Name: Malon_1
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:TXT_FEMALE><NS>...Did I hear shouting? 
Is something wrong?

Messages.Name: Malon_2
Messages.MessageText: <SOUND:TXT_FEMALE><NS>Hmm...

Messages.Name: Malon_3
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:TXT_FEMALE><NS>If everything's fine...<PAUSE> why do you 
look so worried?

Messages.Name: Malon_4
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:TXT_FEMALE><NS>How did the investigation go? 
Did you find anything?

Messages.Name: Malon_5
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:TXT_FEMALE><NS>You believe in me, right?<PAUSE>
I didn't do it. I'd never!
<SOUND:0><TWO CHOICES><G>Of course I believe you!
Well...

Messages.Name: Soldier_3
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:TXT_MALE><NS>Ah, see, there she is.<PAUSE> 
No need to get all upset.<PAUSE>
Patience is a virtue, y'know?

Messages.Name: Link_5
Messages.MessageText: <SOUND:TXT_MALE><NS>Well...

Messages.Name: Link_6
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:TXT_MALE><NS>Um, yes.<PAUSE> The investigation. 
I found tons of,<PAUSE:2> uh,<PAUSE:2> groundbreaking stuff.

Messages.Name: Link_7
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:0><NS><C>(Particularly that the prosecutor's a<SOUND:NA_SE_IT_BOMB_EXPLOSION> jer<Sound:0>k 
who doesn't let anyone else investigate!)

Messages.Name: Link_8_Choice1
Messages.MessageText:
<NS><DI><SOUND:NA_SE_IT_LASH>Of<Sound:TXT_MALE> course I believe you! 
<New_box>
<NS>...Although, I'll be honest, things aren't 
looking very good right now.

Messages.Name: Link_8_Choice2
Messages.MessageText: <SOUND:TXT_MALE><NS>Well, I might be a<PAUSE> little<PAUSE> suspicious...

Messages.Name: Malon_7_Choice2
Messages.MessageText: <NS><SOUND:NA_SE_IT_LASH>He<Sound:TXT_FEMALE>y! Very funny, Link...

Messages.Name: Link_9_Choice2
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:TXT_MALE><NS>Sorry, I'm just kidding. 
Of course I believe you!
<New_box>
Although, I'll be honest, things aren't 
looking very good for you.

Messages.Name: Malon_8
Messages.MessageText: <NS><SOUND:NA_SE_VO_Z0_SIGH_0>H<Sound:0>maaah...<SPEED:3>

Messages.Name: Link_10
Messages.MessageText: <SOUND:TXT_MALE><NS>What's that you've got there?

Messages.Name: Malon_9
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:TXT_FEMALE><NS>Oh, this is just a pictograph of 
father I carry around.

Messages.Name: Malon_10
Messages.MessageText: <SOUND:TXT_FEMALE><NS>I just can't believe he's gone...

Messages.Name: Link_11
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:0><NS><C>(I really wish I knew how 
to cheer her up...)
<New_box>
<SOUND:TXT_MALE><NS>Hmm, y-you know,<PAUSE:2> that pictograph could 
come in handy during the trial...!

Messages.Name: Link_12
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:TXT_MALE><NS>Uh, well, you look so happy together...
<New_box><NS>Maybe it will help convince the 
judge that you couldn't have done it!

Messages.Name: Malon_11
Messages.MessageText: <SOUND:TXT_FEMALE><NS>Oh? How so?

Messages.Name: Malon_12
Messages.MessageText: <SOUND:TXT_FEMALE><NS>You really think so?

Messages.Name: Court_Record_1
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:NA_SE_SY_GET_ITEM><NS><ICON:PRESCRIPTION><DI><R>Mal<Sound:0>on's Pictograph<G> added to the 
Court Record.

Messages.Name: Link_13
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:TXT_MALE><NS>Anyway, I know it's going to be hard, 
but could you tell me everything you 
know?
<New_box>
<NS>It's the only way I'll be able to defend
you.<PAUSE> Otherwise, we have no chance.

Messages.Name: Malon_13
Messages.MessageText: <SOUND:TXT_FEMALE><NS>I understand...<PAUSE> It's just...<FADE:5>

Messages.Name: Soldier_4
Messages.MessageText:
<NS><SOUND:NA_SE_IT_BOMB_EXPLOSION>The<Sound:TXT_MALE> trial is starting! 
The defendant and their attorney, please 
enter the courtroom immediately!

Messages.Name: Link_14
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:0><NS><C>(Uh oh. Shouldn't have said 
those things about having no chance.)
<New_box>
<SOUND:TXT_MALE><NS>All right. Everything will be fine.
<New_box>
<NS>The prosecutor has been playing me for 
a fool since this began, but sooner or 
later, his arrogance will be his undoing.

Messages.Name: Link_15
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:0><NS><C>(My name is <R>Link<C>. 
I've been a defence attorney 
for the last seven years.)
<New_box>
<NS><C>(I've won my fair share of cases... 
and lost some, too. 
But this one is personal.)
<New_box><C>(There's so much at stake here! 
<NS>Not only do I have to save Malon's life, 
I've gotta find out who did this to Talon!)
<New_box><C>(Talon...<PAUSE> He was always so kind. 
<NS>He didn't deserve this. 
I need to do him justice.)
<New_box><NS><C><DI>(I can't lose this!)

Messages.Name: Malon_12b
Messages.MessageText: <SOUND:TXT_FEMALE><NS>Ah, well, here you go, then!

Messages.Name: Link_1b
Messages.MessageText:
<NS><C>(Hm. Speaking of which...)
<New_box>
<NS><C>(Where is she, anyway?)
<New_box>
<NS><SOUND:NA_SE_IT_LASH>Hey<Sound:TXT_MALE>, you, over there!

GlobalHeaders.Text:

#define actor.posY actorf.0x28 
#define actor.posZ actorf.0x2C 
#define actor.dirX actor16.0x30 
#define actor.dirY actor16.0x32 
#define actor.dirZ actor16.0x34 

#define actor.homePosX actorf.0x8 
#define actor.homePosY actorf.0xC 
#define actor.homePosZ actorf.0x10 
#define actor.homeDirX actor16.0x12 
#define actor.homeDirY actor16.0x14 
#define actor.homeDirZ actor16.0x16 
                
#define actor.scaleX actorf.0x50 
#define actor.scaleY actorf.0x54 
#define actor.scaleZ actorf.0x58 

#define actor.velocityX actorf.0x5C 
#define actor.velocityY actorf.0x60 
#define actor.velocityZ actorf.0x64 

#define actor.rotX actor16.0xB4 
#define actor.rotY actor16.0xB6 
#define actor.rotZ actor16.0xB8

#define npcmaker.isSpeaking actor8.0x202
#define npcmaker.invisible actor8.0x169
#define npcmaker.curTextPos actor16.0x370
#define npcmaker.curtextId actor32.0x35c
#define npcmaker.curTextboxNum actor8.0x20A

#define gTextBufPos global16.0x104A6
#define gTextboxPos global8.0x103D6
#define gTextboxType global8.0x103D5
#define gTextboxProperties global8.0x103D4
#define gTextboxDrawPos global16.0x104AA

#define SAVE_PROGRESS save32.0x18 
#define SAVE_HEALTH save32.0x2E
#define EVIDENCE save16.0x36

#define UIACTOR_SPEAKER actor8.0x13C
GlobalHeaders.Name: Definitions

GlobalHeaders.Text:
proc spawnUI
    set ref_actor NPCMAKER 51

    if ref_actor_exists false
        SPAWN 3
            POSITION RELATIVE 0 0 0 
            VARIABLE 58
            ROTATION 0 0 51
        ENDSPAWN
    endif
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc textboxActor txtbox_num speaker_actor
    await frames 3
    ::setSpeaker speaker_actor
    show_textbox_sp txtbox_num
    await textbox_on_screen false
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc textboxSpeaker txtbox_num speaker
    await frames 3
    ::setSpeakerInternal speaker
    show_textbox_sp txtbox_num
    await textbox_on_screen false
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setSelfAsSpeaker speaker
    if vACTOR_SET_SELF_AS_SPEAKER == 0
        return
    else
        ::setSpeakerInternal speaker
        set ref_actor self
        set npcmaker.isSpeaking = 1
        set vACTOR_SET_SELF_AS_SPEAKER = 0
    endif
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setSpeakerInternal speaker
    set ext_var 51 2 = speaker
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setActorAnim actor_id anim_id
    set ext_var actor_id nACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = anim_id
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setSpeaker speaker_actor
    set ext_var speaker_actor nACTOR_SET_SELF_AS_SPEAKER = 1
endproc

proc setTextSpeed speed
    set ram 32 0x80114B54 speed
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setTextSound sound
    set ram 32 0x80114B58 sound
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setNpcMakerVisible actor_id
    set ref_actor npcmaker actor_id
    set npcmaker.invisible = 0
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setNpcMakerInvisible actor_id
    set ref_actor npcmaker actor_id
    set npcmaker.invisible = 1
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setCamera frame
    set cutscene_frame = frame
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setCutsceneBars
    if vSCENE_CUTSCENE_BARS == 1
        set ram 32 0x800FE474 0x20
        //set ram 32 0x800FE478 0x20
    else
        set ram 32 0x800FE474 0
        //set ram 32 0x800FE478 0
    endif
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc rotate actor_id x y z sp
    set ref_actor npcmaker actor_id
    rotation rotate_by ref_actor x y z sp
endproc
GlobalHeaders.Name: Macros

GlobalHeaders.Name: ActorIds

GlobalHeaders.Text:
proc textboxLink txtbox_num
    ::textboxSpeaker txtbox_num SPEAKER_LINK
endproc

proc textboxMalon txtbox_num
    ::textboxActor txtbox_num LOBBY_MALON
endproc

proc textboxSoldier txtbox_num
    ::textboxActor txtbox_num LOBBY_SOLDIER1
endproc

proc textboxUnknown txtbox_num
    ::textboxSpeaker txtbox_num SPEAKER_UNKNOWN
endproc

proc textboxNone txtbox_num
    ::textboxSpeaker txtbox_num SPEAKER_NONE
endproc
